name: Battle Moon Battle
description:
A game prototype based on the classic Starwars trench run. Beat 5 trenches and blow up the Battle Moon.  

Flight tips:

Wings closed are full speed wings open are half speed.

Bumpers are brakes,  right trigger is fire lazers, left for torpedo. 

You don't have to destroy the towers, you dont even have to fly down the trenches, just play play it any way you like.  Personally I fly as fast as I can and roll using the walls as the floor.

Warning: Only works using Xbox controller. 

For more traditional controls download L-Stick if you want to control the space craft with left stick on the game pad.

or if you fly like me, using the right stick, download R-Stick if you want to control the space craft with right controls.  Or download them both and try which ever style you prefer.

For windows

Built in Unity.  Assets modelled in Houdini.
